Nike receives a patent to tokenizing shoes on Ethereum!  According to US Patent and Trademark Office, Nike has patented to use the #Ethereum blockchain to issue ERC721 tokens for some of its shoes.  The sneakers can be linked with unique owner IDs to signify ownership.  #Nike
